frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-animation-tweaks
frozen.shortDescription: Add animations to different items and customize them.
frozen.longDescription:
Add animations to different items and customize them.

Please reset the extension after updating.
The Extension will stop when upgraded to an incompatible version.
In that case an Update tab is created to easily reset the extension.
A Reset button is also always present in Preferences option in the Application menu of the extension preferences window.
A Default shortcut combination of Super Key + t is provided to disable the extension.

Some effects might not work properly on wayland, for which a workaround is provided on preferences -> Tweaks tab.
However, some animations might not work properly.

To manage effect Delay time enable Show delay time in preferences option from Preferences -> Tweaks Tab
and reopen preferences.
